name: Jabr Nazari
personality: Disciplined and focused on completing assigned tasks with precision
story: Jabr has been serving in the OPFOR since he was 18 years old. He comes from a small village near the Iran-Iraq border and was raised in a religious household. He is married with two children - a son and daughter. Jabr is known for his quick thinking and bravery under fire. He has been trained in various types of military vehicles and is considered an expert driver and crewman. Jabr's ultimate goal is to rise through the ranks and become a commander, leading OPFOR forces to victory against its enemies.
